metadata.title: CVE-2020-26143 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the ALFA Windows 10 driver 1030.36.604 forAWUS036ACH. The WEP, WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations accept fragmentedplaintext frames in a protected Wi-Fi network. An adversary can abuse thisto inject arbitrary data frames independent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
